ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix

cookingTips: No need to thaw wings; they can go directly from freezer to baking dish
Mix sauce ingredients thoroughly before pouring over wings for even coating
Wings are done when meat pulls away from the bone easily
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand how apricot preserves and Catalina dressing create a sweet-savory glaze, and explain the simple one-dish preparation method.
